portfolioItems.title: Solace Office Hours - Solace in Finance
portfolioItems.description: I explained my experience deploying and building on Solace at an Investment Bank along with a 101 on Fixed Income!

portfolioItems.title: Experimenting with Three.js, shaders and a Holographic Solly (Solace Mascot)
portfolioItems.description: A 3D Interactive Web App using Three.js (via Threlte) that uses shaders to achieve a holographic effect

portfolioItems.title: EDA Summit Talk - Jet Streams & Market Streams: Navigating EDA in Aviation and Proprietary Trading
portfolioItems.description: I was the moderator for a panel discussion at the EDA Summit 2024 conference where we discussed the challenges and solutions of EDA with CTC and United Airlines.

portfolioItems.title: AWS FSI - Podcast - Innovation in Capital Markets
portfolioItems.description: I was invited to speak on the AWS FSI podcast about how Solace is helping financial institutions innovate in capital markets.

portfolioItems.title: Open Source Project - Solace PubSub+ Plugin for GraphQL
portfolioItems.description: I authored an open source plugin from GraphQL into Solace PubSub+

portfolioItems.title: Open Source Project - Solace Plugin for DAPR
portfolioItems.description: I authored the Solace PubSub+ plugin into DAPR

portfolioItems.title: AWS re:Invent - How to Build a Kafka Mesh
portfolioItems.description: I presented on stage at AWS:ReInvent 2022 on how to implement a Kafka Mesh topology using Solace PubSub+

portfolioItems.title: Podcast - Event Driven Elixir
portfolioItems.description: I was invited to speak on a podcast for Elixir Lang based on a blog post I wrote integrating Solace PubSub+ with Elixir

portfolioItems.title: Open Source Project - Solace Redelivery Delayer
portfolioItems.description: I developed an open source micro-service that implements a delayed delivery pattern to a Solace Queue using Spring and Solace's New Java API. I also made use of Java Streams and Delayed Queues to get the required behavior efficiently.

portfolioItems.title: Whitepaper - A Guide to Connectivity for OpenFin Architects and Developers
portfolioItems.description: I published a white paper that showed how the OpenFin Desktop Application can take advantage of the Solace PubSub+ platform to securely stream data using a variety of message exchange patterns.

portfolioItems.title: Open Source Project - SolCharts
portfolioItems.description: I created an opensource project that made extensive use of the Svelte JavaScript framework as well as Electron, to create a standalone application that is able to chart activity with the Solace PubSub+ broker.

portfolioItems.title: Udemy Course - Battleship over Solace PubSub+
portfolioItems.description: I lead the design and development of a Udemy course that covered the fundamentals of Solace PubSub+ via building an interactive game with Solace and a JavaScript SPA using the Aurelia JS framework. I was also a featured guest blogger on the Aurelia.io site as a result of this initiative.
